nodes.name: Forest
nodes.description: A dense forest filled with wild creatures. You may spend an AP to explore the forest and draw a treasure card.

nodes.name: Village
nodes.description: A peaceful village with friendly inhabitants. You may spend any of your APs to draw a card from the deck.

nodes.name: Mountain
nodes.description: A towering mountain with treacherous paths. You may spend an AP to climb the mountain and gain a treasure card.

nodes.name: Town
nodes.description: A bustling town full of vibrant townsfolk. You may spend an AP to recruit another party member from the companions deck.

nodes.name: Cave
nodes.description: A dark cave filled with hidden treasures. Spend an AP to draw a treasure card.

nodes.name: Lake
nodes.description: A serene lake with magical properties. Spend an AP to restore 1 HP.
